text:
Challenge Question 2 
A young woman is concerned about a newly prescribed drug.  You review 
the labeling for the drug product to find that the drug can cause 
embryofetal toxicity if used during pregnancy.  The labeling is in PLLR 
format.  Where in the drug labeling would you look for information about 
potential risks to the fetus with maternal use of the drug and important 
patient management recommendations? 
 
A. Highlights  
B. Section 5. Warnings and Precautions  
C. Section 8.1. Pregnan
